title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on yellow linen. Rows of brown oval frames containing purple flowers, orange flowers, and clusters of purple and yellow flowers with blue-gren leaves. An alternate row of frames with similar flowers complete the repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-42.
